Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Peachy \Peach"y\ (p[=e]ch"[y^]), a. Resembling a peach or peaches. [1913 Webster]

peachy adj : very good; "he did a bully job"; "a neat sports car"; "had a great time at the party"; "you look simply smashing" [syn: {bang-up}, {bully}, {corking}, {cracking}, {dandy}, {great}, {groovy}, {keen}, {neat}, {nifty}, {not bad(p)}, {slap-up}, {swell}, {smashing}] [also: {peachiest}, {peachier}]
